acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should generate a ClassInfo which contains information for the setters contained in the POJO
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldReturnAClassInfoObjectWhichContainsTheSameAttributesAsThePojoBeingProcessed

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam Utils method to get class info for class class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoToTestSetters and approver
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoToTestSetters and class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoToTestSetters should be equal
Then the attributes contains in ClassInfo should match the ones contains in the POJO
